48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“May the man before whom I am mentioned - and he does not send Salat upon me - be humiliated. And may a man upon whom Ramadan enters and then passes, before he is forgiven, be humiliated. And may a man whose parents reached old age in his presence, and they were not a cause for his entrance to Paradise, be humiliated.”

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم " رَغِمَ أَنْفُ رَجُلٍ " .
chapter.eng-name: “Humiliated is a Man Before Whom I am Mentioned...”
